alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 27 at 4:21AM PST until November 27 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...San Francisco County, the coast of the SF Bay. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 1 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal levels are running about a third to a half foot above predictions. By high tide Monday morning (peaking at around 10:30 AM PST), there will likely to be more minor coastal flooding.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
